content: I've actually found that the hybrid bike is a lot more comfortable for my daily commute, especially since I have to deal with some rough roads and potholes along the way. The hybrid bike's slightly wider tires and more upright riding position have made a big difference in terms of comfort and control. And yeah, it's definitely been easier to navigate through traffic with the hybrid bike, especially since it's a bit more stable and forgiving than my road bike.
